title: Nothing happen after luanch
body: i don't know what should i do to fix this problem please riot i wanna to fix this problem i have more than 3weeks no play lol Can you fast Reply Please ..

replies.body: Same problem i think.  I play everyday and suddenly today, same routine, I hit the "launch" key and the login screens just black.  reinstalling now :(

Without a lot of information to go off of here, it sounds like your OS settings might be preventing the client from launching.  Go over the steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to get that fixed up.  If you still have any issues, let me know with more details!
